data.oai_dc:dc: Stable isotope measurements of nesting male pumpkinseed sunfish (Lepomis gibbosus) and eggs collected from the males’ nests in the littoral and pelagic habitats. Nesting males were collected during Spring 2012 (11 – 22 June). Isotopic compositions (δ13C and δ15N) of nesting male liver tissue and egg samples from the male’s nests are shown. Diet estimates of nesting males are shown based on % Littoral resource contributions to diet for each individual (see methods for details).
